name: A Liminal Place
storyline: You found this hole in reality. (Story is not complete.)
summary:
Hello, wanderer.

You somehow got to this weird place, now, you have to get out! Simple, right? Of course not. If you lose your sanity and get distracted by some beautiful landscape... Ah, your days are numbered. Find the exit, and preferably be alive.
Explore a Lonely World, Alone. Or with Unpleasant Company.

ALP makes the world of Backrooms more solitary, and a little relaxing.
Run Wherever You Want, Even To Secret Places.

No one will disturb you, unless you go where you shouldn't.
About Our Game.

ALP (A Liminal Place) is being created by only one person, Hazard. I was inspired by several creators, such as Vini Cortez, DCE, Valentin, and Many others. I've always dreamed of creating Backrooms games. The Game will be released soon.
